comments.body: Why do we expect done to be false?
Because the stream is infinite. We'll never be done with it.
The tests in here could use some cleanup. I'll do that in a separate PR once this one has landed.

diffHunk:
@@ -12,15 +12,20 @@ import * as LibMod from '../daml/daml-tests/Lib/Mod';
 const LEDGER_ID = 'daml2ts-tests';

comments.body: I'm planning to add another birthday via `exerciseByKey`. That's why I added the 5 and 6 everywhere.

```suggestion
    sumProd: {tag: 'Corge', value: {x:'1', y:'Garlpy'}},
```
Let's add the trailing comma so we don't always get a two-line change whenever we want to add a single line.

```suggestion
import Ledger, { CreateEvent, ArchiveEvent } from  '@digitalasset/daml-ledger-fetch'
```
and remove the previous line.
